import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Col, Container, Image, Row, Card, ListGroup, Button, } from "react-bootstrap"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import Typewriter from "typewriter-effect"; import ParticleComponent from "../components/ParticleComponent"; const About = () => { const particlesInit = (main) => { console.log(main); // you can initialize the tsParticles instance (main) here, adding custom shapes or presets }; const particlesLoaded = (container) => { console.log(container); }; const [data, setData] = useState(null); return ( { const fetchedData = await fetch('https://localhost:8000/').then(response => response.json()).then(data => setData(data)); typewriter.typeString(data.description).start(); }} />
